Name: Fearless
Description: Being fearless is a beneficial trait in a place of life and death in battle. Although fear allows a person to survive longer to fight another day, being fearless is more of a double-edged sword.

Name: Fear
Description: There should be no fear in the machine of war. Fear makes even obedient soldiers refuse to follow the command after all.

Name: Hope
Description: Optimism to survive and see the better days is good. A soldier always fights harder when there is hope.

Name: Disrupt
Description: Disruption must be quelled before chaos breaks out.

Name: Hidden
Description: Unseen by enemies. Ambush them at the right time, and you may win this battle effortlessly.

Name: Blind
Description: Blindness is pretty much the equivalent of certain death in battle. Unable to both attack and defend, such disability must be treated as soon as possible.

Name: Silence
Description: Unable to speak, unable to cast a spell. Looking at the bright side, this is the time to replenish mana.

Name: Fight To The Death
Description: These troops are already broken but cannot flee from battle. They will fight to the last man.

Name: Sleep
Description: While sleeping is good for the body, sleeping at the wrong time and place is not a wise thing to do.

Name: Panic
Description: "Forward! I said forward you fool! Listen to my command!"

Name: Berserk
Description: Desolation, destruction, elimination and eradication! Stop at nothing until your enemy is no more.

Name: Orc Berserk
Description: Even more devastating and violent than normal berserk, orc berserk make these soldiers an ultimate killing machine!

Name: Confuse
Description: "Where is the enemy? What is going on? Why is everyone around me doing nothing?"

Name: Run Amok
Description: Cavalry troops have one downside is that their mounts can run amok from anything that spooks them, Be it fire or very loud noise or even stress. This makes their mount uncontrollable and will attack anyone in their path.

Name: Unconscious
Description: Being unconscious in battle is often a death sentence, especially in melee combat.

Name: Oiled
Description: Oiled up and ready to be cooked. These troops will catch fire much faster.

Name: Blessed
Description: Blessed be the believer. Your god grant you the purpose to fulfil your destiny.

Name: Cursed
Description: The damned will walk the earth until no sun longer shines.

Name: Plague
Description: Anyone with a plague is dangerous to everyone around him, especially when so many people are staying so close in tight formation.

Name: Strong Will
Description: Strength in the mind is the foundation of true strength.

Name: Stun
Description: Vision blur, hearing deafen, regain oneself or be perished.

Name: Entangle
Description: Entangle to the ground, unable to move. The time to run may yet come, so shake off the obstacle as soon as possible.

Name: Focus
Description: Focus to accomplish what is necessary. These troops will fight to the fullest without distraction.

Name: Poison
Description: A dangerous substance that causes damage over time. Endure and hope for the best or seek aid.

Name: Deadly Poison
Description: A deadly poison that cannot be cured. Very few can survive this painful experience, and even fewer can live a long life after.

Name: Burn
Description: Dead by burning is not a good way to go. Try to drench yourselves as soon as possible.

Name: Freeze
Description: Frozen in place and time. Nothing to be done but wait.

Name: Wet
Description: Being wet can either be good or bad. Fire and burning become much less effective, but the damage and effect of air and water become a dangerous threat.

Name: Drunk
Description: Getting drunk in battle may not be the smartest thing to do, but It sure helps raise the morale and fierceness of the troops.

Name: Cripple
Description: Cripple in body, but can the heart hold out? Only time will tell.

Name: Petrify
Description: Fresh to stone. Statue of endless time to serve as a warning to others.

Name: Slow
Description: Slowing to a crawl. Best be steady, or you may lose both race and war.

Name: Haste
Description: Superior speed leads to victory. The momentum is with us to seize any fortune from the enemy.

Name: Undead Curse
Description: Restless in life and disturbed in death. This curse is hideous in all forms.

Name: Flying
Description: The dream of flight is now the reality of warfare.

Name: Floating
Description: Air superiority is gained by a small height difference at a time.

Name: Charmed
Description: "Damn! Akusb got charmed by succubus again! Someone go get some water, beer and a stick!"

Name: Bewitched
Description: "Damn! Akusb got bewitched by mermaids this time! Go get a compass, a priest, and a monkey here!"

Name: Paralysed
Description: Paralysed and unable to act, these troops are now an easy target for coup de grace.

Name: Knock Down
Description: No matter how many times you get knocked down, only by getting up is when you can fight again.

Name: Aging
Description: The flow of time is unstoppable, but the process of life can be accelerated.

Name: Disarmed
Description: Losing a weapon is a shame that any warrior worth their salt should reconsider their life. But now is a good time to run.

Name: Enlarged
Description: Larger body to inflict unimaginable scale of destruction. Can a larger brain increase one intelligence also?

Name: Rusted
Description: No longer as impressive as the old time. Rusted and corroded to become dirt in the soil.

Name: Clear Mind
Description: Unoccupied by unnecessary thought. A mind is most useful when it is empty.

Name: Bleeding
Description: A bleeding wound is often not much emergency issue in the face of life and death in battle. Such a wound still takes its toll in long term, though.

Name: Deaf
Description: Free from the music of the universe. The first step into the true quietness of a grave.

Name: Infect
Description: Precarious threat from outside invading the inside. Cured only by either the inner strength or assistance from cleansing substances.

Name: Marked
Description: Marked for death to embrace the grip of life. Endure the pain, and you may live to see another day.

Name: Weaken
Description: Weaken but not unwilling to fight. May the Lord grants them strength once again.

Name: Smoke
Description: Smoke reduces the sight of these troops, making them less effective in combat, but improves range defence.

Name: Suppressed
Description: These troops are being suppressed by range attacks making them almost unable to move. But it also improves their range defence.

Name: Armour Shattered
Description: Protection no more. Fresh and blood are exposed to danger now.

Name: Final Drive
Description: Last dance of life, to embrace death willingly.

Name: Whip Cracked
Description: The very sound of oppression of the soul. One crack and all shall obey.

Name: Calm Berserk
Description: Controlled chaos is nothing short of unnatural. By the process of intensive training, calm berserk allows these troops to unleash its wrath without losing control.

Name: Breaching
Description: Breaching through a mass of battalion is no easy task, even for the finest cavalry force. Hold fast and be tenacious.

Name: Insane
Description: Sanity is a fickle thing. Once changed, the world turns over.

Name: Gobbling
Description: Something big is inside these creatures' mouths or stomachs causing them to have trouble moving and fighting.

Name: Reviving
Description: Return from death to bear the burden of life once again.

Name: Angel Guardian
Description: Receive 50% of damage from damage taken by nearby friendly squads

Name: Provoke
Description: Exploited by the sin of wrath. The enemy must be vanquished!

Name: All Round Defense
Description: The perfect form of fighting with no weakness. This will surely be worth the tale of heroism.

Name: Severe Burning
Description: The burning wounds become so severe now that simply drenching the fire may not save the person anymore. This also causes panic among the troop trying to flee from such fire.

Name: Drench
Description: Wet from head to toes, almost as if swimming in the water. Avoid cold temperature or air element damage at all costs.

Name: Cold
Description: Cold and shivering. Not a good sign for winter warfare. Find someplace warm or light up the fire.

Name: Hot
Description: Hot, is it not? Be careful of heatstroke.

Name: Decimated
Description: Decimation can increase the morale of the troops for a short while so they can fight longer before they realise that surrender may be an option after all.

Name: Enraged
Description: Anger clouded rational judgment. Exploit this momentary weakness or suffer the punishment.

Name: Drown
Description: Drowning is not the most comfortable way to go.

Name: Quicksand Sink
Description: Worse than any other kind of death when you can see an escape in sight but cannot grasp it.

Name: Collapse
Description: Collapsing may allow one to recover strength. If they can wake up again, that is.
